data.title: Orenburg State Medical University
data.meta_description: About University   University The Orenburg State Medical University is one of the ancient universities of Russia. It is a leading training, research, and cultural centre booming higher education at all levels. The university is focused on professional training, scientific research, and advanced technology usage along with the curriculum study. The University believes in the practical approach of the theory that’s why always offers prolific and rigorous opportunities to OSU students. Additionally, friendly approaches with other countries like France, Germany, Finland, the USA, Japan, Kazakhstan, and other CIS members help students to adapt to the changes of the globalizing world.  Students can feel a special educational environment with the sustainability of strong traditions, continuous strive for academic potential, and enhancement of the facilities for the social, cultural, and sports activities. Highlights of Orenburg State Medical University   High-skilled professionals including 132 staff members have Doctor of Science degrees and 658 staff members are candidates of Science degrees. Recently, more than 14000 students are studying. The university is equipped with advanced technology like high-speed transmission links, a scientific library, and modern laboratories. There are 5 successfully operating Doctoral Dissertation Councils at OSU.   Faculties are:   Faculty of General Medicine Faculty of Pediatrics Faculty of Dentistry Department of preventive care Pharmaceutical Department Department of Clinical Psychology. City About Orenburg is a beautiful city in Russia and the administrative centre of the Orenburg region. The city is established in the south of the Urals (river) in Russia. Its unofficial name is the “Asian Capital” of Russia. The economy of Orenburg is strong due to the contribution of industries like natural gas extracting, machine building, oil processing, and light industries. The city is rich in maintaining its historical monuments and heritage. There are different places to visit including museums, theaters, monuments (caravanserai, St. Nicholas Cathedral and so many), and natural sights like Belovka (The embankment of the Ural River), and a stone Elizabethan Gate (a symbolic gateway to Asia). The city is also economical that offers low-cost living to students. Indian students at Orenburg State Medical University Medical Degree at Orenburg State Medical University:  OSMU MBBS degree is worldwide recognized and accepted. The degree of medical study provided is MD (Physician) which is equivalent to MBBS in India. The duration of the study is 6 years including 5 years of classroom learning and 1 year of apprenticeship. International Recognition:  The medical degree is recognized and accredited by the WHO (World Health Organization) and MCI (Medical Council of India). The University degree is also valid in Europe (except UK and Ireland) without any exam. Students:  Due to the high-quality education and low medical fees, OSMU has a high number of foreign students. It is one of the favorable universities for Indian students too. Low-Cost MBBS:  Medical Fees at Orenburg is very low as well as the cost of living. The institute does not demand any donation fees or entrance fees. Language:  The medium of study in Russia in English or Russian. Foreign students are taught in the English language while they have to learn Russian too. About Hostel Bogomolets National Medical University has beautiful accommodation for Indian students. The hostel features all basic facilities like furniture, internet, canteen, 24 hours security and big spaced rooms. There is a separate section for Indian students in which there are different hostels for boys and girls. The hostel is nearby to the University which is in continuous security of the dean as well as Lakshya MBBS OverseasTeam. Co-curricular Activities:  The University has ground for the football stadium, exercise centres, sports ground for handball, swimming pool, wellness club, and volleyball. Students are encouraged to participate in various meetings, cultural programs, meetings, competitive examinations, sports, courses, and international competitions. Orenburg State Medical University Fees for MBBS 1st Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 2nd Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 3rd Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 4th Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 5th Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 6th Year INR 371000.00 $ 5300.00 Full Price INR 2226000.00 $ 31800.00
data.text:
Medical Degree at Orenburg State Medical University: OSMU MBBS degree is worldwide recognized and accepted. The degree of medical study provided is MD (Physician) which is equivalent to MBBS in India. The duration of the study is 6 years including 5 years of classroom learning and 1 year of apprenticeship.

International Recognition: The medical degree is recognized and accredited by the WHO (World Health Organization) and MCI (Medical Council of India). The University degree is also valid in Europe (except UK and Ireland) without any exam.

Students: Due to the high-quality education and low medical fees, OSMU has a high number of foreign students. It is one of the favorable universities for Indian students too.

Low-Cost MBBS: Medical Fees at Orenburg is very low as well as the cost of living. The institute does not demand any donation fees or entrance fees.

Language: The medium of study in Russia in English or Russian. Foreign students are taught in the English language while they have to learn Russian too.

Bogomolets National Medical University has beautiful accommodation for Indian students. The hostel features all basic facilities like furniture, internet, canteen, 24 hours security and big spaced rooms. There is a separate section for Indian students in which there are different hostels for boys and girls. The hostel is nearby to the University which is in continuous security of the dean as well as Lakshya MBBS OverseasTeam.

Co-curricular Activities: The University has ground for the football stadium, exercise centres, sports ground for handball, swimming pool, wellness club, and volleyball. Students are encouraged to participate in various meetings, cultural programs, meetings, competitive examinations, sports, courses, and international competitions.
